#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
long long int M,N,deno,numo;

long long int gcd(long long int a , long long int b)
{
	if (b==0)
        return a;
 
    // a is greater
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	long long int i,j,g;
	while(T--){
		cin>>N>>M;
		deno = N*M;
		numo = ((M + 1) / 2) * (N / 2);
		numo += ((N + 1) / 2) * (M / 2);
		g = gcd(deno,numo);
		numo /= g;
		deno /= g;
		cout<<numo<<"/"<<deno<<endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
